Events that occurred on 12 November.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1949 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Miss How.
1952 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 135a.
1970 - Actor Craig Parker is born.
1995 - Actor Robert Stephens dies.
2002 - The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (Extended Edition) is released on DVD.
2006 - Ring*Con 2006 in Fulda, Germany.
2008 - Fantasy, Myth and the Measure of Truth is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
F.A. 495:
Tuor, guided by VoronwÃ«, travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmo's message to Turgon.
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
